title: House for Sale in Katugasthota
details:
Good Residential Property in KANDY - Aruppola Road, Mahaiyawa

100 mtrs to Dharmashoka Mawatha (Maha Wanguwa)
3 Km to Kandy Town

Single story house around 2000 Sq Ft.
4 Rooms, 2 Bathrooms, Pantry, Living Room, Dining Room, car parking for 10 vehicles
Large garden space,

20 feet wide road access
55 road frontage
Land extent - 21 perches
Price Rs. 50 Million (negotiable)



PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
